title: English Speaking Proficiency Improvement Program through BOPPPS Integration with ChatGPT

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English proficiency and basic computer literacy skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizing English Communication Skills for Mathematics Curriculum Integration Targeting Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 20% improvement in TOEFL speaking evaluation criteria (pronunciation, fluency, vocabulary, grammar, interaction) six months later
Learners achieve the ability to engage in over 10 minutes of continuous academic conversation (e.g., math problem explanations, instructional discussions) through 1:1 role-playing with ChatGPT
Learners can self-directly establish and execute speaking practice plans based on BOPPPS stage-specific feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
